name: Authority probing
summary: Identify who can approve terms and what the decision process is to avoid late-stage surprises.
goal: Prevent last-minute 'I need to check' delays and negotiate with the real decision-maker.
counterparty_guidance: Clarify your decision process without over-disclosing internal limits.
State who decides and what inputs matter, then ask about their authority.
Avoid committing until the right stakeholders are aligned.
Propose a clear next step to move the decision forward.
